title: Victrix by PDP Gaming Pro FS-12 Arcade Fight Stick for PlayStation 5, Durable Aluminum, 12-Button Sanwa Denshi, Ergonomic Detachable Joystick, Lockable Control Bar for PS5 Fighting Games (Purple)
features: BUILT TO LAST - Keep the fight going with our custom built Arcade Fight Stick chalked full of everything you need to win. Made from a single piece of aircraft-grade aluminum, the Pro FS-12 is extremely durable to handle all the bumps and drops of travel.

LAND THE PUNCH - Make every hit count with pro-grade 24mm and 30mm Sanwa Denshi buttons and control bar featuring the PS touchpad. Stay comfortable via the integrated 6.28Â° wrist slope, ergonomic button layout, and built-in foam lap pad on the back.

CUSTOMIZE THE FIGHT - Custom built for the fight on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and PC using the built-in mode switch. Open the quick-access back panel to cleanly laid out components for easy mods and updates using the included Allen wrench.

PERFECT CONTROL ANYWHERE - Durable carrying handles and cable organizers make the Pro FS-12 ideal for moving around during competitions. Lock out the control bar buttons when you activate Tournament Mode, so you never have to worry about accidental DQs.
NEXT-GEN GAMING - Tuned for top fighting games like Mortal Kombat, Street Fighter, Tekken, Soul Calibur and Dragon Ball.
description: Focus on fighting your enemy, not fatigue, with the built-in comfort features of the Victrix Pro FS-12 Arcade Fight Stick. Land every hit, especially when it matters most, with the reliable Sanwa Denshi buttons. Made for tournaments, the Pro FS-12 has integrated carrying handles and cable organizers for easy transportation, and a control bar filled with the buttons you need to make quick adjustments. Simply swap out components and make mods with the quick-access back panel and clean layout. Get ready to play like a pro with the tournament-ready Victrix Pro FS-12 Arcade Fight Stick. In the Box: - Victrix Pro FS-12 Arcade Fight Stick Featuring Authentic Sanwa Denshi Parts - 3m Detachable Braided USB-C Controller Cable - Allen Wrench - Storage Bag - Instruction Manual Technical Specifications, Electrical: Input Latency: 5ms Buttons: (8) 24mm Sanwa Denshi Action Buttons Joystick: 24mm Sanwa Denshi Direction Buttons, 30mm Sanwa Denshi UP Button PCB: Victrix Custom Connection Type: USB-C to USB Type-A Audio Support: 3.5mm Headset Jack for Audio Output and Mic Input Compatibility: PS5, PS4, PC XInput Technical Specifications, Mechanical: Cable Length: 3m Detachable Shaft: No Case Material: Aircraft Grade Aluminum Weight: 7.8 lbs Dimensions: 16.25" x 11" x 2.25"
